vote.text: Amendment SA 4111 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4111 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Schatz. (consideration: CR S7624; text: CR S7624) To strike the funding provision.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4111 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Schatz.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4111 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
